entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RangeAttribute double parsing issue with hungarian culture #109672
    Future
  • BigInteger correctness regression from .NET 8 #109669
    9.0.x
  • UnsafeAccessorAttribute fails to access volatile field #109665
  • C++/CLI 4.7.2 System::Text::Json System.Buffers.ReadOnlySequence undefined #109664

Closed

  • Test failure: System.IO.Tests.File_Delete_Tests.FileSystemWatcher_File_Delete_InNestedDirectory #103549
    Future
  • C# Collections for docs #90463
    Future
  • Issue with new X509CertificateLoader #109007
    9.0.0
  • [Analyzer Proposal]: Warn on use of StreamReader.EndOfStream in async methods #98834
    10.0.0
  • TaskCompletionSource performance #109662
  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize is not working with some camel case properties. Example: uMLDesign #109663
  • PI is wrong #109666

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix the condition to exclude only native shared libs #109676
    area-Setup, community-contribution
  • Revert "Exclude shared libs from ilcframework in nupkg" #109675
    needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-staging] Support setting ACLs on file paths longer than `MAX_PATH` #109674
    area-System.IO, 8.0.x
  • win32: add fallback to environment vars for system folder #109673
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: tail merge returns with multiple statements #109670
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: enable tail merge for try exits #109661
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Remove unnecessary StreamReader.EndOfStream call from NetworkInformation #109631
    area-System.Net
  • Update trimmer attributes for `ComActivator` #109655
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix upload conflict Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref in official build #109650
    area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • Add FromFile to BinaryData #107231
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Remove CoreCLR PAL's InternalNew/Delete and just use new/delete with std::nothrow #109659
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Expand "return condition" into "return condition ? true : false" #107499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move MonoClass:inlinearray_value out of MonoClass #109363
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Add VPCLMULQDQ intrinsics #109137
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: postdominators #109656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Check input length for empty when decrypting with padding #109660
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • error MSB3231: Unable to remove directory #42963
  • Track signature errors #42870
  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    Backlog
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • Microsoft.Windows.SDK.NET.Ref package not referenced when targeting .NET 5.0 in .NET 9.0 RC.2 SDK #44705
  • Publish does not natively handle multitargeting like Build does #2597
    Discussion
  • GLIBC_PRIVATE not defined error in dotnet SDK when installed via snap #40272

PullRequests

Updated

  • [dotnet-watch] Simplify file watching #44603
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Clean up polling file watcher #35712
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Run 'AddImplicitDefineConstants' on 'BeforeCompile' #44695
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Prevent copy/paste of password and warn #44761
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2578457 #44765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #44657
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Analyzer to simplify LINQ expressions by using an overload that accepts a Func<TSource,TResult> #75845
  • Sex #75843
  • Extra calls in Asm #75842

Closed

  • Analyzer to simplify LINQ expressions by using an overload that accepts a Func<TSource,Boolean> #75844
  • Long-running IAsyncEnumerable<T> leaks the last seen enumerated value. #74013
    Backlog
  • Type name of EditorFeaturesOnTheFlyDocsElement appears at the end of QuickInfo in Razor component #75106
    17.13 P2
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35508.20 #75840

PullRequests

Created

  • Create features/DictionaryExpression branch and resurrect parsing for those expressions #75846
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Use `IsManagedType` for determining which state machine hoisted locals to clear #75841
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Clear current value when awaiting in async-iterator #75426
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Bail out of on-the-fly-docs for razor documents #75818
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.13 to main #75839
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix source-generator reload when in 'balanced' mode #75831
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Null-conditional assignment 1 #75821
    Area-Compilers, 17.13
  • Improve performance on `SymbolCompletionProviderTests` #75496
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Enhance explicit interface implementation completion provider #75568
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce IVsFreeThreadedFileChangeEvents2.DirectoryChangedEx2 notifications from VS shell #75815
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make it easier to leverage existing configured JWT and JWKS infra to manually validate tokens #58851
  • gRPC Transcoding: options to ser/deserialize enums without prefix #58850
  • Why does the page automatically redirect to "/Account/Login" when the user is not authorized? #58848

Closed

  • Routing with common prefix #58838
  • Blazor - Wasm pre-rendering (without server interactivity) - MSAL Auth on client side only not working #58833
  • [Blazor] Unuseful message when calling InvokeAsync() #58821

PullRequests

Created

  • chore: fixed missed conditional theory for testing named pipe #58849
    community-contribution, area-networking

Merged

  • Use the runtime->AspNetCore transport package as the sentinel package instead of the BrowserDebugHost package #58847
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Support returning OpenAPI document in YAML from MapOpenApi #58616
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Descriptive Error for Improper Use of [AsParameters] #58218
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • Fix IIS outofprocess to remove WebSocket compression handshake #58846
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Handling CultureInfo.InvariantCulture in RequestLocalizationMiddleware #58844
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Adds the ability to specify an appsettings file for user-jwts #58605
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Why were efforts to fix the entirely broken Editor component in iOS abandoned, >1 year after being initially marked P/1? #25759
  • CollectionVew on Android Consumes Gestures #25758

Closed

  • RadioButtonGroup/RadioButton throw CGContextSetLineWidth error on iOS 18.0/18.1. #25273
  • iOS app crash with MAUI 8.0.72 Xcode 15.4 simulator MacOS 14.7.1 #25756
  • Application display version not updating on Android #25755
  • ImageButton border (BorderWidth) overlaps the image instead of adding space #22520
    Backlog
  • Android ImageButton Aspect="AspectFit" not display correctly #24856
    .NET 9 SR2

PullRequests

Merged

  • [iOS] RadioButton throws CGContextSetLineWidth - Fix #25542
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton
  • ImageButton border (BorderWidth) overlaps the image instead of adding space - fix #21259
    community ✨, area-controls-border, .NET 9 SR2

Updated

  • Setup lane to run CV2 and CV1 tests #25719
    area-testing
  • Disable `MeasureInvalidated` propagation by default / clean-up legacy layouts / fix iOS CV items resize #25664
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [iOS] Improve background layer frame mapping performance #24848
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR2

entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Skip index and FK creation using fluent API builder #35066
  • Generate warning when new index on the same columns remove old one #35065
